author: Cortex XSOAR

classifier.description: Maps incoming Gmail phishing email messages fields.
classifier.name: Gmail Single User - Incoming Mapper

commands.description: Tests that Gmail auth is configured properly. Use this command after completing the OAuth2 authentication process.
commands.name: gmail-auth-test

commands.description: Starts the OAuth2 process. Get a link to use to authenticate to Gmail.
commands.name: gmail-auth-link

commands.description: Retrieves attachments from a sent Gmail message.
commands.name: gmail-get-attachments

commands.description: Replies to a mail using Gmail.
commands.name: reply-mail

name: Gmail Single User
readme:
Gmail Single User gives you the ability to send emails and fetch emails as incidents to Cortex XSOAR.
Use this pack if you only want to fetch and send emails from a single user's mailbox. If you need to access multiple user mailboxes, use the [GMail Integration](https://xsoar.pan.dev/docs/reference/integrations/gmail).

## What does this pack do?
Using the commands in this integration, you can:
- Send emails.
- Reply to an email.
- Access the attachments of an email.
